entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -30.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 8:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -30.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: NNW 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then mainly sunny. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
